name: North Field Alpha
description: Primary grain production field with excellent drainage and fertile loam soil. Ideal for corn and wheat rotation with GPS-mapped boundaries.

name: South Meadow
description: Organic-certified field with natural grass coverage, suitable for sustainable farming practices and livestock grazing. Recent soil tests show optimal pH.

name: East Valley Field
description: Large-scale cultivation area with center-pivot irrigation system. Perfect for high-yield crop production and mechanized operations. Recently expanded.

name: West Ridge Plot
description: Elevated field with excellent sun exposure and natural windbreak. Ideal for specialty crops and experimental farming techniques.

name: Central Prairie
description: Expansive flat terrain ideal for large-scale operations. Well-suited for cash crops and efficient equipment movement with minimal slope variation.

name: River Bottom Field
description: Rich alluvial soil near water source with high productivity potential. Natural moisture retention and protected from prevailing winds.
